objects.text:
• SpaceWalk 3-Layer Sole System
• Premium Canvas Material
• Roomy Toe Box Design
• Ultra-Cushioned Comfort

product_details.name: X Lows CORTADO
product_details.description:
- The Cortado is a study in perfect ratios.
- Like its namesake Spanish coffee, the pristine white canvas flows like steamed milk, while rich brown accents cut through with the boldness of rich, crema-topped espresso, same as a baristas pour.Bold yet smooth, the Cortado is a daily essential brewed to perfection. - Ever-soft and ever-snug grip- Roomy toe box lets our broad Indian toes breathe.- Irresistible comfort, thanks to SpaceWalk, our signature 3-layered sole system.
- SpaceWalk is light, airy, and cloud-like, and is named so for all the right reasons.
- What you'll be stepping into is a long-lasting insole placed on top of an ultra-cushioned sheet of foam found in running shoes.
- The sheet is then housed inside a light-weight rubber outsole for sturdiness, making this a go-to choice for everything from morning walks to house party nights.
- SpaceWalks grooves and textures let you land on your feet in style with zero slip and max abrasion resistance.
- Materials:Upper: Canvas with Microfiber UnderlayFootbed: Synthetic LeatherSole: Rubber, EVA

banner_details:
The banner features a modern and clean layout with a rich, earthy theme to promote a stylish footwear product. The background consists of bold geometric overlays and muted illustrations in a diagonal composition, adding depth and visual interest. Large, bold text (ID: "heading") emphasizes the product name, supported by an eye-catching subheading (ID: "subheading"). A smaller tagline (ID: "tagline") reinforces the product's appeal, followed by a concise list of features (ID: "description"). The price (ID: "price") is prominently displayed, and a clear call-to-action button (ID: "cta" over "cta_background") invites user interaction. A stylish sneaker image (ID: "product_image") is angled dynamically for emphasis.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Brown (#412717)
- Cocoa Brown (#9C7A61)
- Soft Ivory Beige (#E6D7C9)
- Pure White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: This product image features a sneaker with a warm, neutral color palette that blends sophistication with a natural aesthetic. The main body is an off-white or cream canvas (#F5F1E6), creating a clean and refined base. The lace, inner lining, and outsole incorporate rich mocha brown tones (#6B4A36), adding depth and grounding the design. The sole takes a beige tint (#E2D6C6), harmonizing with both the upper and the darker tones. The accent star logo is crisp white (#FFFFFF) outlined with brown, drawing attention without overwhelming the simplicity. These earth-toned colors balance each other, ideal for a minimalist, lifestyle-themed advertisement banner.
